title: Water Damage - no sound unless headphones used
content:
I dropped my pixel 3a in some water for 2/3 seconds - after turning it off for a few hours, it works as normal apart from the sound. I can use headphones to listen to music (not tried phoning yet) but normal sound without headphones does not work. 

Is it a case of leave it somewhere warm and hope for the best? Thank you!
